text: aur (is maal mein unaka bhee hissa hai) jo unake baad aae, ve kahate hai, "ai hamaare rab! hamen kshama kar de aur hamaare un bhaiyon ko bhee jo eemaanalaane mein hamase agrasar rahe aur hamaare dilon mein eemaanavaalon ke lie koee vidvesh na rakh. ai hamaare rab! too nishchay hee bada karunaamay, atyant dayaavaan hai.
